name: Bella Poarch
description:
'''Denarie Bautista Taylor'''
(born '''Belinda Marie Macadengdeng Batumbakal'''; February 9, 1997), known professionally as '''Bella Poarch''' ({{IPAc-en|p|ɔː|r|tʃ}} {{Respell|PORCH}}), is an American social media influencer and singer. On August 17, 2020,{{Efn|Although some sources have said the video was posted on August 18, 2020, such as [https://www.dexerto.com/entertainment/bella-poarch-celebrates-one-year-anniversary-of-viral-tiktok-that-made-her-famous-1634078/ Dexerto], (see [[WP:DEXERTO]]), others such as [[Wikipedia:RSMUSIC|reliable sources]],  [https://www.businessinsider.com/bella-poarch-tiktok-tyga-tattoo-navy-age-military-how-old-2020-10 Business Insider] and [https://www.stereogum.com/2097845/remember-blackpool-grime-it-now-soundtracks-the-most-popular-tiktok-of-all-time/news/ Stereogum],  have said August 17, 2020.}} she created the most liked video on [[TikTok]], in which she lip syncs to the song "[[M to the B]]" by British rapper Millie B. She is the most followed TikTok contributor from the Philippines.

{{As of|2025|7|4|df=US|post=,}} she has 93.6 million followers on TikTok, ranking as the [[List of most-followed TikTok accounts|fourth most-followed individual]] on the platform behind [[Khaby Lame]], [[Charli D'Amelio]] and [[MrBeast]]. She signed a music record deal with [[Warner Records]] in May 2021, releasing her debut single "[[Build a Bitch]]".
